title: One Problem with the new rune system
body: When the new patch came out for the preseason, I didn't get the RP or the mystery epic skin shards for the rune pages i bought before. I bought the 7 rune page bundle. What can I do?

replies.body: You're not meant to get an RP refund for old rune pages you bought since they transfer over into the new rune system. You still get to use those pages you bought. You do need to also complete a mission for the rune page skin you're going to get, so make sure you play a match!
It's a mission. Check your mission log.
